Package imagingbook.pub.regions

Class RegionContourLabeling

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.regions.RegionLabeling
      • imagingbook.pub.regions.RegionContourLabeling
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContourTracer
    public class RegionContourLabeling
extends RegionLabeling
implements ContourTracer
    Binary region labeler based on a combined region labeling and contour tracing algorithm: F. Chang, C. J. Chen, and C. J. Lu. A linear-time component labeling algorithm using contour tracing technique. Computer Vision, Graphics, and Image Processing: Image Understanding 93(2), 206-220 (2004).
    Version:
    2020/04/01
